Articles.Content:
http://www.freetoplaythemovie.com/

I'm just curious if anyone else has seen this and their thoughts on it and on esports as a concept. Especially when you see what the Koreans and Chinese are like.

Its free to watch and basically follows 3 gamers as they compete in the biggest gaming tournament (with a $1 million grand prize) at the time of filming. Also gives insight into the world of professional gaming.

I would love to get the opinion of some parents on this
